fields.summary: TiAPI: Add scroll end/start events for ListView

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Please implement the scroll event for the ListView, event should be the same as the one in TableView so I can migrate my last tableview as well.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.TableView-event-scroll

comments.body: Resolving it as a duplicate of TIMOB-16244. Please track that feature request for further updates. You can also add your use case to that ticket.
